Package edu.kcc.java.order.data

Interface OrderRecordDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderRecordDAOCSV
    public interface OrderRecordDAO
    A Data Access Object (DAO) interface for working with OrderRecord data.
    Author:
    Bob Trapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createOrderRecord​(OrderRecord orderRecord)
      Create a new record in the data store.
      void deleteOrderRecord​(OrderRecord orderRecord)
      Removes the supplied record from the data store.
      List<OrderRecord> getAllOrderRecords()
      Returns a list of all available order records.
      OrderRecord getOrderRecord​(String orderNumber)
      Returns the Order Record associated with the supplied order number, or null if there is no such record.
      void updateOrderRecord​(OrderRecord original, OrderRecord updated)
      Updates an existing Order Record in the data store.

    • Method Detail

      • createOrderRecord

        void createOrderRecord​(OrderRecord orderRecord)
                throws OrderRecordDataException
        Create a new record in the data store.
        Parameters:
        orderRecord -
        Throws:
        OrderRecordDataException

      • getOrderRecord

        OrderRecord getOrderRecord​(String orderNumber)
                    throws OrderRecordDataException
        Returns the Order Record associated with the supplied order number, or null if there is no such record.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the order number of the desired order record
        Returns:
        the order record or null if no match
        Throws:
        OrderRecordDataException

      • getAllOrderRecords

        List<OrderRecord> getAllOrderRecords()
                              throws OrderRecordDataException
        Returns a list of all available order records.
        Returns:
        List of OrderRecord objects in the data store
        Throws:
        OrderRecordDataException

      • updateOrderRecord

        void updateOrderRecord​(OrderRecord original,
                       OrderRecord updated)
                throws OrderRecordDataException
        Updates an existing Order Record in the data store. The original must be found or the method will throw an Exception. The updated OrderRecord contains the changes. The order number cannot be changed through this method.
        Parameters:
        original - the order record to be changed
        updated - the new data for the record
        Throws:
        OrderRecordDataException

      • deleteOrderRecord

        void deleteOrderRecord​(OrderRecord orderRecord)
                throws OrderRecordDataException
        Removes the supplied record from the data store.
        Parameters:
        orderRecord - the record to remove
        Throws:
        OrderRecordDataException
